text: @JoeBiden Why is #JoeBiden wearing an earpiece when broadcasting solo from his home?  Could it be because he cannot remember what he is supposed to say? #cognitiveDecline?  #PrimaryElection #WhichSideAreYouOn #PowerToThePeople #GOTV #NotMeUs #Bernie2020 #Coronavirus #StimulusPlan #HVNYL

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
